com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.utils

Class ZbeInputProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.utils.ZbeInputProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class ZbeInputProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    Default Input Processor. Keeps a record of all currently pressed keys.
